The diagram depicts the following screen captures of the ping command.

Baseline
On FEB 2, 2007 08:14:43 a ping command to the following IP was made 10.66.254.159. The delay times for the ping were all 1 millisecond.

Congestion problems?
On MAR 17, 2007 14:41:06 a ping command to the following IP was made 10.66.254.159. The delay times for the ping were all 6 millisecond.
